1.content:
Jackson: Jackson is 5"10 with short brown hair, slightly tan skin, and is very athletic. He is on the college soccer team which gives him a lean, muscular body. He is well known as one of the most attractive guys on campus. But Jackson has two secrets, he is secretly gay, and he has a huge appetite.

Tom: Tom is 6"1 with shaggy black hair and white skin. He was on the football team in college but he recently sustained an injury to his ankle. He is very well muscled and loves showing off his body. He was able to keep his God-like figure despite the injury, but with all the temptation to eat the junk food the island is made of, will he be able to keep it for long?

Ben: Ben is 6"2 with shaggy blond hair and very tan skin. He was on the football team in high school but when he went to college he decided football wasn't for him. Even though he dropped out of the sport, his appetite he needed to maintain for football didn't diminish and he gained the freshmen 50. Tom and Dean give him a hard time about his beginning beer belly but Jackson doesn't seem to mind it.

Dean: Dean is an inch short of 6"0 with neatly trimmed light brown hair and slightly tan skin. Dean plays lacrosse for the college so he has a muscular build and loves to eat healthy. He takes great pride in his body, and even though he could have any girl on campus he wanted, the guys have yet to see him take a girl home. Is he just shy or is he hiding something?
1.title: Choose which of the boys point of view you want:

choices: Finds a note in his pocket
Starts exploring the island. He's getting hungry after last night's party!
14.content:
Dean slowly starts to gain memories of his previous night of partying.

"What the hell happened?" he thinks to himself.

"Where am I?"

What does Dean do next?
14.title: Dean

info.brief_description: 4 college guys wake up on an island made completely of food!
info.description:
4 college guys wake up from a night full of hardcore partying and wake up an island where everything is made of food with no idea how they got there.
The four guys are:

Jackson: Jackson is 5"10 with short brown hair, slightly tan skin, and is very athletic. He is on the college soccer team which gives him a lean, muscular body. He is well known as one of the most attractive guys on campus. But Jackson has two secrets, he is secretly gay, and he has a huge appetite.

Tom: Tom is 6"1 with shaggy black hair and white skin. He was on the football team in college but he recently sustained an injury to his ankle. He is very well muscled and loves showing off his body. He was able to keep his God-like figure despite the injury, but with all the temptation to eat the junk food the island is made of, will he be able to keep it for long?

Ben: Ben is 6"2 with shaggy blond hair and very tan skin. He was on the football team in high school but when he went to college he decided football wasn't for him. Even though he dropped out of the sport, his appetite he needed to maintain for football didn't diminish and he gained the freshmen 50. Tom and Dean give him a hard time about his beginning beer belly but Jackson doesn't seem to mind it.

Dean: Dean is an inch short of 6"0 with neatly trimmed light brown hair and slightly tan skin. Dean plays lacrosse for the college so he has a muscular build and loves to eat healthy. He takes great pride in his body, and even though he could have any girl on campus he wanted, the guys have yet to see him take a girl home. Is he just shy or is he hiding something?

All four boys have been good friends with each other since high school and they're very close. You can decide whether the boys are alone on the island or whether the boys find people. Everything on the island is completely made of food. It even rains food there! You decide which boys are able to hold out and which ones eat as much food as they can! No killing, no gore, no bursting, popping, or anything of the sort. No magic weight gain and no "he gained 500 pounds in a day". The food can have an addictive quality if you want it to. Please stick to the rules and the character types and most of all have fun!
